summary: Cisco is an American tech company that makes and sells technology for computer networks. It was started in 1984 by two computer scientists who wanted to connect computers over long distances. They created a way to link computers using different systems, called a local area network (LAN). Cisco makes many products, like Webex for video calls, and helps with internet security and managing energy. It became a very valuable company, even more so than Microsoft, during the dot-com era. Cisco's stock is part of important stock market indices like the Dow Jones and S&P 500.
title: Cisco
